patterns: Is Vidyalankar Institute of Technology accredited?
responses: Yes, Vidyalankar  Institute of Technology is accredited A+ by NAAC

patterns: Am I eligible for admission to engineering course?
who all are eligible for engineering admission
responses: Please refer to the eligibility criteria specified by the Competent Authority for Admissions, in Admission Brochure on http://cetcell.mahacet.org/

intents.tag: close existing course to start emerging course
patterns: Whether institute can apply for emerging course by closing the existing course?
Can institute close the existing course and apply for emerging courses?
Is it acceptable to close the existing course and apply for emerging course
responses: Yes. As per the procedure laid down in APH 2021-22

patterns: When admission process for Institute Level Quota seats shall begin?
when will admission process for Institute Level Quota will start
responses: Admission process for Institute Level Quota seats shall begin as soon as State CET Cell /DTE announce admission rules and calendar. Be connected with www.vit.edu.in for updates.

patterns: Does college offer Internship and/or Entrepreneurship/Start-up guidance?
Is there any opportunity for Internship and/or Entrepreneurship/Start-up
What is scope for Internship and/or Entrepreneurship/Start-up
responses: Institute has dedicated Internship Cell. It offers internship opportunities to students in external organisations. All departments also offer in-house internships to students. Institute has Entrepreneurship Nurturing Cell. This cell guides interested

patterns: Who is the HOD of INFT department
responses: Dr. Vipul Dalal

patterns: How can i contact the principal
responses: you can mail to principle@vit.edu.in

patterns: Whom should we contact for erp realated query
whom to contact for erp query
responses: sudhir.kulkarni@vit.edu.in

patterns: Who is the exam coordinator of INFT
responses: Prof. Vinita Bhandiwad is the exam cordinator of the INFT department

patterns: Where is Vidyalankar Institute Of Technology Located?
responses: Vidyalankar Institute Of Technology is located in Wadala, Mumbai, India
